psalm.text:
[[Ps 149,1]]Sing to the LORD a new song 
of praise in the assembly of the faithful.
[[Ps 149,2]]Let Israel be glad in their maker, 
let the children of Zion rejoice in their king.

[[Ps 149,3]]Let them praise his name in the festive dance, 
let them sing praise to him with timbrel and harp.
[[Ps 149,4]]For the LORD loves his people, 
and he adorns the lowly with victory.

[[Ps 149,5]]Let the faithful exult in glory; 
let them sing for joy upon their couches;
[[Ps 149,6a]]Let the high praises of God be in their throats.
[[Ps 149,9b]]This is the glory of all his faithful. Alleluia!
psalm.title: Psalms

first_reading.text:
[[Ac 16,11]]We set sail from Troas, making a straight run for Samothrace, and on the next day to Neapolis,
[[Ac 16,12]]and from there to Philippi, a leading city in that district of Macedonia and a Roman colony. We spent some time in that city.
[[Ac 16,13]]On the sabbath we went outside the city gate along the river where we thought there would be a place of prayer. We sat and spoke with the women who had gathered there.
[[Ac 16,14]]One of them, a woman named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth, from the city of Thyatira, a worshiper of God, listened, and the Lord opened her heart to pay attention to what Paul was saying.
[[Ac 16,15]]After she and her household had been baptized, she offered us an invitation, "If you consider me a believer in the Lord, come and stay at my home," and she prevailed on us.
first_reading.title: Acts of the Apostles

gospel.text:
[[Jn 15,26]]Jesus said to his disciples: "When the Advocate comes whom I will send you from the Father, the Spirit of truth that proceeds from the Father, he will testify to me.
[[Jn 15,27]]And you also testify, because you have been with me from the beginning.
[[Jn 16,1]]I have told you this so that you may not fall away.
[[Jn 16,2]]They will expel you from the synagogues; in fact, the hour is coming when everyone who kills you will think he is offering worship to God.
[[Jn 16,3]]They will do this because they have not known either the Father or me.
[[Jn 16,4a]]I have told you this so that when their hour comes you may remember that I told you."
gospel.title: Holy Gospel of Jesus Christ according to Saint John
